multiple-choice.question: We choose an element $x$ uniformly at random from the set $\{1,2,3,\dots,10\}$. Define the events [defs] A = "$x$ is even" [/defs] and [defs] B = "$1 \leq x \leq 6$". [/defs] Which of the following is true?
multiple-choice.answer: The events $A$ and $B$ are not independent.
